body:
Server: NA

Type of Bug: Game Bug

Description: I have mecha ward, but playing ingame, everytime i get the yellow trinket into the pink vision upgrade, and then i place it it shows the Golden Goal Ward.

Video / Screenshot: http://imgur.com/7EhaiMD,pAvDSCW,yllBaLH,JJVHfvS,VU8hv5U,sZfsOe1#3
http://imgur.com/7EhaiMD,pAvDSCW,yllBaLH,JJVHfvS,VU8hv5U,sZfsOe1#5                  (((( this one shows how it is replaced.

Steps to reproduce: 1) buy warding totem(yellow trinket). 2)get to level 9. 3) buy the vision ward (upgrade to pink) 4) place it

Expected result: Mecha pink ward

Observed result: Golden Goal pink Ward

 Reproduction rate: 10/10 (i only have tried with ezreal, and with selected ward skin "mecha ward") but there are my pics showing im telling the truth gl&hf:)

System specs: IRRELEVANT

replies.body: This is a known issue and we're working on a fix! :D
